statements: SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products;
SELECT product_name, expiry_date FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE manufacturing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE authenticity_verified = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, barcode FROM pharmaceutical_products ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE barcode = '12345';
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE expiry_date > CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE authenticity_verified = TRUE ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE manufacturing_date >= '2022-01-01' AND manufacturing_date < '2022-03-01' ORDER BY barcode ASC;
SELECT product_name, expiry_date FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE authenticity_verified = FALSE AND expiry_date < CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY expiry_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products, MAX(manufacturing_date) AS latest_manufacturing_date FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE authenticity_verified = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, manufacture_date FROM Product WHERE barcode_id = '12345';
SELECT * FROM Packaging WHERE packaging_location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT packaging_id, packaging_location FROM Packaging ORDER BY packaging_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, manufacture_date, expiry_date FROM Product WHERE expiry_date > NOW();
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE product_name = 'Milk'
SELECT product_name, manufacture_date FROM Product WHERE expiry_date > current_timestamp
SELECT DISTINCT barcode_id, product_name FROM Product WHERE manufacture_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM Packaging ORDER BY packaging_date DESC
SELECT packaging_location, COUNT(*) FROM Packaging GROUP BY packaging_location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products;
SELECT product_name, barcode FROM pharmaceutical_products;
SELECT packaging_id, packaging_date, scanned_status FROM packaging;
SELECT * FROM scanning_logs;
SELECT packaging_id, scan_timestamp, verification_result FROM scanning_logs;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE product_id IN (1, 5, 8);
SELECT packaging_id, scan_timestamp, verification_result FROM scanning_logs WHERE verification_result = 'Counterfeit';
SELECT packaging_id, packaging_date, scanned_status FROM packaging ORDER BY packaging_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, barcode FROM pharmaceutical_products JOIN packaging ON pharmaceutical_products.product_id = packaging.product_id WHERE packaging.scanned_status = true;
SELECT * FROM barcode_scanners ORDER BY scanner_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE manufacturing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) as total_scanners FROM barcode_scanners GROUP BY manufacturer;
SELECT * FROM packaging_units WHERE quantity >= 100 ORDER BY unit_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT scanner_id, COUNT(*) as total_scans FROM scanned_data GROUP BY scanner_id HAVING total_scans > 10;
SELECT * FROM barcode_scanners WHERE manufacturer = 'Epson';
SELECT product_name, manufacturing_date FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE expiry_date > '2023-12-31';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM pharmaceutical_products JOIN packaging_units ON pharmaceutical_products.product_id = packaging_units.product_id;
SELECT s.scanner_name, sd.scan_time FROM barcode_scanners s JOIN scanned_data sd ON s.id = sd.scanner_id WHERE sd.scan_time >= '2022-01-01' AND sd.scan_time < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM packaging_units WHERE quantity BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
SELECT * FROM ProductInformation;
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer FROM ProductInformation WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PackagingHistory WHERE scanned_by_user = 'John Doe';
SELECT packaging_date, expiration_date, packaging_location FROM PackagedProducts WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT barcode, verification_result FROM AuthenticationLog WHERE verification_result = 'verified';
SELECT * FROM ProductInformation;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM PackagedProducts WHERE packaging_location='Warehouse A';
SELECT product_id, packaging_date, expiration_date FROM PackagedProducts WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT MAX(history_id), MIN(history_id) FROM PackagingHistory;
SELECT scanned_by_user, scan_result, verification_result FROM PackagingHistory INNER JOIN AuthenticationLog ON PackagingHistory.history_id = AuthenticationLog.log_id;
